1.0.name: wordpress/bbpress-admin-notes
1.0.description: This is a simple extension that allows forum admins and editors to leave notes on topic replies. If you run a support forum, or any other community forum, this is a great way for forum moderators to communicate privately between each other in relation to the replies.
